name: Data Infrastructure Establishment
so_i_can: ensure secure and efficient data storage and retrieval
ac: Data can be securely stored, retrieved, and is resistant to breaches.

name: Advanced Data Processing & Analysis
i_want_to: process and analyze data using advanced algorithms
so_i_can: derive meaningful insights and improve decision-making
ac: Data is processed accurately, and insights are generated.

name: Decision-making Enhancements
so_i_can: make better matches and improve overall efficiency
ac: Decision-making tools provide accurate and timely recommendations.

name: Strategic Planning Tools Integration
so_i_can: forecast future demand and identify strategic opportunities
ac: External tools are seamlessly integrated and provide accurate forecasts.

name: Feedback Mechanisms & Learning Algorithms
so_i_can: improve the matching process over time
ac: Feedback is collected, analyzed, and used to refine the matching algorithm.

name: Secure Data Collection & Storage
i_want_to: securely input my data into the system
so_i_can: ensure my data's privacy and security
ac: Data is encrypted, securely stored, and only accessible by authorized personnel.

name: Data Cleaning & Preliminary Matching
so_i_can: ensure its quality and readiness for analysis
ac: Data is cleaned, validated, and inconsistencies are handled.

name: Opportunity Matching & Profile Sharing
i_want_to: identify potential matches between consultants and opportunities
ac: Potential matches are identified and profiles are shared with clients.

name: Rate Determination & Contract Monitoring
so_i_can: ensure fair compensation and budget adherence
ac: Rates are determined based on market trends, consultant profiles, and historical data.

name: Long-term Demand Forecasting
ac: Demand estimates are accurate and based on historical data and market research.

name: Feedback Collection & Analysis
so_i_can: improve the matching process over time
ac: Feedback is collected, analyzed, and used to refine the matching algorithm.

name: Build ConsultantDB, OpportunityDB, AccountDB
so_i_can: efficiently manage and retrieve consultant, opportunity, and account data
ac: Databases are established, data is stored/retrieved efficiently, and there are no data breaches.

name: Develop Data Cleaning Algorithms
ac: Data is cleaned, validated, and ready for analysis.

name: Develop Preliminary Matching Algorithms
so_i_can: shortlist potential matches for further analysis
ac: Potential matches are identified based on preliminary criteria.

name: Develop Opportunity Matching Algorithms
ac: Consultants are matched to opportunities based on set criteria.

name: Implement Rate Determination Algorithms
ac: Rates are determined based on market trends, consultant profiles, and historical data.

name: Implement Contract Monitoring Systems
so_i_can: manage resource allocation and project timelines
ac: Contract statuses are monitored, and notifications are sent for nearing end dates or status changes.

name: Develop Feedback Collection Mechanisms
so_i_can: improve the matching process over time
ac: Feedback is collected and stored for analysis.

name: Implement Learning Algorithms
ac: Matching algorithm improves over time based on feedback.
